Honey never spoils. Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3000 years old and still edible.
Bananas are berries, but strawberries aren't. Botanically, a berry is a fruit produced from the ovary of a single flower with seeds embedded in the flesh.
Octopuses have three hearts. Two pump blood to the gills, while the third pumps it to the rest of the body.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus. It takes about 243 Earth days to rotate once but only about 225 Earth days to orbit the Sun.
Wombat poop is cube-shaped. This unique shape prevents the poop from rolling away, marking their territory.
Avocados are toxic to birds. They contain a substance called persin, which can be harmful or fatal to many birds.
Humans share 60% of their DNA with bananas. This reflects the basic biological functions shared among living organisms.
A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance.' This term reflects their colorful appearance and social behavior.
Cleopatra lived closer in time to the Moon landing than to the construction of the Great Pyramid of Giza.
The Eiffel Tower can be 15 cm taller during the summer. This is due to the expansion of iron in the heat.
Cows have best friends and get stressed when they are separated. They form close bonds with other cows.
A jiffy is an actual unit of time. It refers to 1/100th of a second.
Sharks are older than trees. Sharks have existed for about 400 million years, while trees have been around for about 350 million years.
The heart of a blue whale is so large, a human can swim through its arteries.
Scotland’s national animal is the unicorn. It symbolizes purity and innocence in Celtic mythology.
The longest place name in the world is 85 characters long: Taumatawhakatangihangakoauauotamateapokaiwhenuakitanatahu.
The inventor of the frisbee was turned into a frisbee after he died. His ashes were molded into a frisbee by his family.
A single strand of spaghetti is called a 'spaghetto.'
The world's largest desert is Antarctica. Despite being cold, it qualifies as a desert due to its low precipitation.
Banging your head against a wall for one hour burns 150 calories. However, it’s not a recommended way to lose weight.
There are more stars in the universe than grains of sand on all the Earth's beaches combined.
A small child could swim through the veins of a blue whale. Their veins are about the size of a small car.
The average person walks the equivalent of five times around the world in their lifetime.
A group of hedgehogs is called a 'prickle.'
The shortest war in history was between Britain and Zanzibar on August 27, 1896. Zanzibar surrendered after 38 minutes.
The world's largest snowflake was recorded at 15 inches wide in Fort Keogh, Montana, in 1887.
The total weight of ants on Earth is greater than that of all humans. Estimates suggest there are around 20 quadrillion ants.
A small child can produce enough saliva in their lifetime to fill two swimming pools.
A flock of crows is called a 'murder.'
The fingerprints of a koala are so similar to humans that they can taint crime scenes.
The world's largest living organism is a honey fungus in Oregon that spans over 2,385 acres.
You can hear a blue whale's heartbeat from over 2 miles away.
The longest English word without a vowel is 'rhythms.'
A snail can sleep for three years. They can hibernate or enter a dormant state until conditions improve.
Venus is the hottest planet in our solar system, with surface temperatures around 900 degrees Fahrenheit.
A day on Earth is not exactly 24 hours; it is about 23 hours and 56 minutes.
The average human body contains enough fat to make seven bars of soap.
A cat's nose print is unique, just like a human's fingerprint.
The word 'set' has the highest number of different meanings in the English language.
There are no bridges connecting the mainland U.S. to Alaska. The only way to get there is by plane or boat.
The Great Wall of China is not visible from space with the naked eye.
Cheetahs cannot roar like lions but they can make a variety of sounds, including purring and chirping.
Dead skin cells are a primary ingredient in household dust.
Kangaroos can't walk backward. This is due to their unique anatomy.
The world's smallest reptile was discovered in 2021 and is smaller than a pea.
A bolt of lightning is five times hotter than the surface of the sun.
The average person produces enough saliva to fill two swimming pools in their lifetime.
A group of owls is called a 'parliament.'
The hashtag symbol is technically called an octothorpe.
There are more fake flamingos in the world than real ones.
Pineapple works as a natural meat tenderizer due to the enzyme bromelain.
In Switzerland, it is illegal to own just one guinea pig because they are social animals.
A day on Mercury lasts 176 Earth days, while a year on Mercury is only 88 Earth days.
The longest wedding veil was the same length as 63.5 football fields.
A group of ravens is called a 'constellation.'
A crocodile cannot stick its tongue out.
Wombats can run up to 25 miles per hour.
The first computer mouse was made of wood.
Some cats are allergic to humans.
The shortest commercial flight in the world lasts about 57 seconds.
The world's oldest known 'your mom' joke is 3,500 years old.
Rats laugh when tickled.
It rains diamonds on Jupiter and Saturn.
A shrimp's heart is located in its head.
The inventor of the microwave appliance was inspired by a chocolate bar melting in his pocket.
A lion's roar can be heard from five miles away.
Humans are the only animals that blush.
A group of frogs is called an 'army.'
Ketchup was once sold as medicine in the 1830s.
A snail can sleep for three years.
The average person will spend six months of their life waiting for red lights to turn green.
The world's largest snowman was over 122 feet tall.
The first video game was created in 1958 and was called 'Tennis for Two.'
A group of pugs is called a 'grumble.'
The world's largest pizza was made in Rome and measured 1261 square meters.
The first email was sent in 1971.
The unicorn is the national animal of Scotland.
The world's most expensive coffee, Kopi Luwak, is made from coffee beans that have been eaten and excreted by civets.
